biotools.summary: It allows researchers to explore a network of gene and protein interactions based on published scientific literature. For each gene search, it reports sentences from abstracts associating it with other genes, links out to full abstracts, and reports experimental evidence for the interactions, if available. You can also select sentences to create and visualize your own gene model.

bioschemas.name: iHOP
